answerText: The Piano Lesson[10] The Piano Lesson is one this author's Pittsburgh Cycle which also includes Seven Guitars and Fences.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 6 | 20 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Avery Brown wants to win the love of Crawley's widow in this play, and that widow teaches Maretha to use the title object. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Boy Willie hears Sutter's ghost whenever he tries to remove the title object, despite Berniece's pleas.
